name: Garden Invasion
description:
Wow, I think I made one of the worst games on the planet ! 

But hey, I'm still proud because it's first ever 100% home-made game. I wrote all the "code" and made all the "art". Took me a around 5 hours maybe, including the art (You can probably see that). 

Look Mom, I'm a game dev now !

Feedback is welcome in the comments.

Known bugs:

  • hitbox of the mobs are not OK. This is because they are all generated in the same way and the sprite is randomly selected, but the hitbox remains the same.
  • The sprite for the mouse cursor doesn't display over the text. I played with z-ordering, but haven't found the fix yet.

Future features (if I ever want to improve this game, LOL):

  • Decent art (pixel art maybe)
  • Add animations
  • Add sounds
  • Add other weapons and behaviours tomato-bomb, potato-missile, ... ?)
  • Add health to the mobs

Bugfixes:

  • Difficulty increase not properly reset between games.
  • Pointer not displaying above the mobs 
  • Increased carrot speed
